Base widget¶

Base module to be used by all the llrf widgets.

class llrfgui.widgets.basellrfwidget.BaseLLRFWidget(config_file, parent=None)¶

Base class to be used by any other LLRF widget.

It provides the basic interface.

CV = [['0.01 mV/s [0]', 0], ['0.03 mV/s [1]', 1], ['0.1 mV/s [2]', 2], ['0.33 mV/s [3]', 3], ['1 mV/s [4]', 4], ['2 mV/s [5]', 5], ['4 mV/s [6]', 6], ['Immediatly apply [7]', 7]]¶
_connect_all_attributes(*args, **kws)¶

Private method in charge of connect all attributes.

This method is connecting a list of tango attributes with their correspondent widget.

_create_attributes_lists(*args, **kws)¶

Creation of attributes list.

Create empty lists for the tango attributes that will be connected to the internal widgets.

_get_attributes_from_yaml(*args, **kws)¶

Get the attributes and its associated widget from a yaml config file.

Parameters:yaml_file – YAML file to read
Returns:
_get_config_file_name(file)¶
_get_extended_attribute(*args, **kws)¶
_is_extra_attribute(*args, **kws)¶
_set_comboboxes(*args, **kws)¶

Method to set possible values in a combobox.

connect_attribute(*args, **kws)¶

Method to connect a single tango attribute with a widget.

connect_combobox(*args, **kws)¶

Method to connect a single combobox with its tango attribute.

connect_signals(*args, **kws)¶

Method to connect QT signals with methods.

By default isvoid, and it should be implemented by the widget itself.

connect_with_devices(*args, **kws)¶

Creation of the tango device proxys.

To be overwritten if needed.

setModel(*args, **kws)¶

Set the model of the widget.

This method could be overwritten if needed due to a different model (i.e. widgets with a list of devices as model)

Parameters:
  • model (str) – Model to be set.
  • section (str) – Section to be controlled.
